# NSUndoCloseGroupingRunLoopOrdering

**Global Variable**

A priority to use when using a run loop to close an undo group.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSUndoCloseGroupingRunLoopOrdering: Int
```

## Discussion

Use this value as the `order` parameter if you call [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/RunLoop/perform(_:target:argument:order:modes:)] to have a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/RunLoop] perform a selector that closes an undo group.

## Working with run loops

- **runLoopModes**: The modes governing the types of input to handle during a cycle of the run loop.
